samples.question: [Transcript chunk 2]
samples.transcript: So I mostly work from home so I definitely need to have a laptop so yeah I pretty much use a computer every day and when did you first start using a computer the first time I ever used the computer was when when I was a child so we used to have a family computer now everybody has their own personal laptop or computer so we used to have a family computer where it was like mostly for my brother but then I would have my turn using it as well and do you enjoy using a computer yes sometimes I enjoy it sometimes I have to use it so I would say my life is connected to computers so well there is some enjoyment involved but then again sometimes you just have to like use it for a task or for a job do you think we use computers too much today yes I definitely think we use too much computers these days it is not our fault it is how it is designed like our lives are designed like this so if you have even if you have to buy a ticket you have to use a computer or your mobile phone so yeah I definitely think we use too much computer today these days.
